Pre-Game Insights: A loss for either side could put their qualification hopes in doubt.
The Kiwis are on a three-match losing streak, while the Men in Green have won their previous game against Bangladesh, ending a four-match losing streak of their own.
A win against Pakistan on Saturday would seal their place in the knockout rounds of the World Cup 2023.
It has been a see-saw tournament for New Zealand. After winning their opening four matches, the Kiwis find themselves in danger going winless in the previous three games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The winner of this game will take a huge step towards semifinal qualification.
The ICC ODI World Cup 2023 game between Pakistan and New Zealand will be played on Saturday, November 04, 2023.
The match between Pakistan and New Zealand will be played at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru.
The ICC ODI World Cup 2023 game between Pakistan and New Zealand is scheduled to kickstart at 10:30 IST (+5:30 GMT).
Others: The live streaming of the game between Pakistan and New Zealand will be on Disney+ Hotstar.
All the mobile users would be able to view the World Cup clash involving the hosts for free of cost on the Disney+ Hotstar mobile app.
